players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie has gone missing without a trace. Let's stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other."
Bob: "I agree with Diana. Let's all be cautious and trust no one blindly."
You: "I believe we should all be on high alert, as one of us is a mafioso. Let's try to gather more information and make informed decisions."
Diana: "I think it's important that we all share any suspicious activities or observations we may have had since the last night. It could help us uncover the truth about what happened to Charlie."
Bob: "I recall hearing strange noises coming from the forest late last night. It was around the time when Charlie disappeared. I think it's worth investigating further."
